name: stw
short: A minigame where users can spin a wheel to win items
description: This cog allows the bot owner to add items to a wheel which can be spinned twice a week by users to win items. These items will be added to a user's inventory but do not serve any purpose.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing STW!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
